model.domain

Class BookList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.domain.BookList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BookList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    class BookList creates a list of books with the type ArrayList and it implements Serializable. It has one instance variable of ArrayList type of Book.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookList()
      The purpose of the constructor is to initialize the instance variable by creating an empty list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBook(Book book)
      The method passes a book as a parameter and adds it to the list and it will check so null cannot be added to the list.
      java.util.ArrayList<Book> getBookList()
      This method is returning ArrayList of books
      void removeBook(Book book)
      The method removes a specific book which is passed as a parameter and it checks if the list is greater than 1 the act of removing can be done otherwise the book cannot be removed from the list.
      void removeBookByIndex(int index)
      The method is removing the book by passing the index of the book.
      int size()
      The method simply returns the size of the list.

      java.lang.String viewList()

      • removeBook

        public void removeBook(Book book)
        The method removes a specific book which is passed as a parameter and it checks if the list is greater than 1 the act of removing can be done otherwise the book cannot be removed from the list.
        Parameters:
        book -

      • removeBookByIndex

        public void removeBookByIndex(int index)
        The method is removing the book by passing the index of the book. it checks if the book is available or not , if the book is not available means that it is borrowed by someone so it will throw an exception and it cannot be deleted.
        Parameters:
        index - of the book in the list
